name: .DRAWIT File Extension
summary: Learn about .DRAWIT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Drawing created by DrawIt, a vector drawing program for Mac OS X; saves drawn shapes, colors, and filters using layers; support non-destructive filters, which means that the drawn elements are preserved in their original form even after filters are applied.

content: DRAWIT files are saved in the Mac OS X package format. Therefore, you can right-click them and select "Show Package Contents" to view the included files.
NOTE: DrawIt has been discontinued, but Sketch can still open DRAWIT files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
